articles.author: Holmes Lybrand and Fredreka Schouten, CNN
articles.title: New Mexico county commissioner who refuses to certify recent election results sentenced for role in January 6 attack
articles.description: Couy Griffin, a New Mexico county commissioner, ardent election-fraud conspiracy theorist and founder of "Cowboys for Trump," avoided more jail time on Friday for his role in the January 6, 2021, US Capitol attack.
articles.content: (CNN)Couy Griffin, a New Mexico county commissioner, ardent election-fraud conspiracy theorist and founder of "Cowboys for Trump," avoided more jail time on Friday for his role in the January 6, 2021… [+2581 chars]

articles.author: Opinion by Cristian Gherasim
articles.title: Opinion: As Ukraine dreams of joining the EU, its ex-Communist neighbors have lessons
articles.description: Ukraine seeks European Union membership amid its war with Russia, and the European Commission has endorsed consideration of the EU bid put forward by President Volodymyr Zelensky's government. But as Kyiv pursues this hope, neighboring countries in Eastern Eu…
articles.content: Cristian Gherasim is an analyst, consultant and journalist focusing on Eastern and Central European affairs. Follow him on Twitter @Crstn_Gherasim. The views expressed in this commentary are his own.… [+10589 chars]

articles.author: Holmes Lybrand and Avery Lotz, CNN
articles.title: US Capitol rioter who carried weapon loaded with hollow-point bullets pleads guilty
articles.description: A January 6, 2021, rioter pleaded guilty Friday to carrying a loaded firearm on US Capitol grounds and assaulting police officers with one of their own batons during the insurrection.

articles.author: Jason Hanna, CNN
articles.title: Suspect in deadly Alabama shooting occasionally attended the church, police say. A person there held him down
articles.description: A 71-year-old man who shot dead two senior citizens and injured another at an Alabama church group's meeting Thursday evening was subdued by someone else at the event until police arrived, authorities said Friday.

articles.author: Kate Sullivan
articles.title: Biden says he's been briefed on Americans missing in Ukraine and urges against travel to the nation
articles.description: President Joe Biden said Friday he has been briefed on the three Americans who have gone missing in Ukraine after they traveled to the country to fight alongside Ukrainian forces against Russia.
articles.content:

articles.title: Watch: US officials assured Ukraine's defense minister military aid 'will never stop' - CNN Video
articles.description: In an exclusive interview, Ukraine's defense minister tells CNN's Matthew Chance about the state of his country and how US officials assured him military aid "will never stop."

articles.author: Alicia Wallace, CNN Business
articles.title: Here's what the Fed rate hike means for your salary
articles.description: American workers have seen their wages climb faster than at any time since the mid-1980s. But high inflation means workers have been handed a pay cut.

articles.author: Phil Mattingly, CNN
articles.title: 'They're like our nerd warriors': Inside the Treasury Department's economic war on Russia
articles.description: Three months into US-led sanctions designed to crush Russia's economy for its war in Ukraine, Russia has appeared surprisingly resilient.
articles.content:

articles.author: Ivana Kottasová, Anna Chernova, Fred Pleitgen and Zahra Ullah, CNN
articles.title: Putin lambasts the West and declares the end of 'the era of the unipolar world'
articles.description: Russian President Vladimir Putin has declared the end of "the era of the unipolar world" in a combative speech that lambasted Western countries at St. Petersburg International Economic Forum on Friday.

articles.author: Anna Cooban and Uliana Pavlova, CNN Business
articles.title: Chipmakers brace for more trouble as Russia limits exports of rare gases
articles.description: The semiconductor industry just can't catch a break. After two years of pandemic-fueled supply bottlenecks, Russia, one of the world's biggest suppliers of industrial gases used to make chips, has started to limit its exports.
